description.value:
When you reach a Sorcerer level specified in the Nature Domain Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Nature Domain Spells
Sorcerer LevelSpells
3@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplAnimalFrie]{Animal Friendship}@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBarkskin00]{Barkskin}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSpeakWithA]{Speak with Animals}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSpikeGrowt]{Spike Growth}
5@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplPlantGrowt]{Plant Growth}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplWindWall00]{Wind Wall}
7@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDominateBe]{Dominate Beast}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGraspingVi]{Grasping Vine}
9@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDestructiv]{Destructive Wave}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplTreeStride]{Tree Stride}
